price: 37.Nabii Aadam isi Rabbik Qangooruy usuk kaa Barseeh kaa yiysixxige beeteeh oggoleeh kaa edde kallaceeh Yalli toobat kaak oggoleh, Diggah usuk isi Naqoosak kaal gace marak toobat oggolaah isi Naqoosah farakka iyya Racmat- le Rabbi kinni.
arabic: فَتَلَقَّىٰٓ ءَادَمُ مِن رَّبِّهِۦ كَلِمَٰتٖ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fatalaqqā ādamu min rabbihi kalimātin fatāba ʿalayhi innahu huwa al-tawābu al-raḥīmu
